name: Docs for PlayStation
description:
Docs for PlayStation® is a new digital platform developed exclusively for PlayStation® that delivers a unique way for users to access their documentation. Game manuals, strategy guides, art books, comics, and more can now be accessed and viewed in a dynamic, digital format via console, mobile, tablets and web at https://docs.playstation.com.

• Built for PlayStation®
Docs for PlayStation® offers a new way for users to access their documentation across the PlayStation® family of hardware (PS4TM system, PSTM Vita).



Video output in Full HD 1080p requires 1080p native display.

1080p HD Video Output

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service).

• Second Screen
Allows for a true second screen experience. The platform automatically adapts to any screen it’s viewed on, from smart phones and tablets, all the way to large HD TVs.

• Dynamic Experience
The platform allows for dynamic content, such as video, expandable screen shots, music / SFX, GIFs, and more.
